name: Xero Java oAuth 2 App
description: App to demonstrate Xero Java SDK with OAuth 2 support

XERO_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Xero Client ID. Get one from developer.xero.com

XERO_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your Xero Client Secret. Get one from developer.xero.com

XERO_REDIRECT_URI.description: Your redirect uri that you set at developer.xero.com, it must match the URL for your Heroku app plus /Callback
